org.forgerock.openam.saml2

Class UtilProxySAMLAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.saml2.SAMLBase
      • org.forgerock.openam.saml2.UtilProxySAMLAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SAMLAuthenticator

    public class UtilProxySAMLAuthenticator
extends SAMLBase
implements SAMLAuthenticator
    An implementation of A SAMLAuthenticator that uses the Util classes to make the federation connection.

                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                  PrintWriter out,
                                  boolean isFromECP)
        Creates a new UtilProxySAMLAuthenticator using the detail provided.
        Parameters:
        data - the request containing the details of the Federate request.
        request - the Http request object.
        response - the Http response object.
        out - the print out.
        isFromECP - true if this request was made by an ECP.

        public void authenticate()
                  throws FederatedSSOException,
                         IOException
        Description copied from interface: SAMLAuthenticator
        Perform authentication tasks.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface SAMLAuthenticator
        Throws:
        FederatedSSOException - If federation authentication was not successful.
        IOException - if the Federation request fails because of communication problems.
